# UISearchTextFieldDelegate

**Protocol**

The interface for the delegate of a search field.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UISearchTextFieldDelegate : UITextFieldDelegate
```

## Overview

A search field asks its delegate for an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSItemProvider] when the user starts to copy or move a token. To support these interactions, set the search field’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/delegate] to an instance of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextFieldDelegate] that implements [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextFieldDelegate/searchTextField(_:itemProviderForCopying:)] and set the search field’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextField/allowsCopyingTokens] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

The search field’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteConfigurationSupporting/pasteDelegate] handles pasting and dropping tokens as well as text.

## Providing information to copy and drag

- **searchTextField(_:itemProviderForCopying:)**: Asks the delegate for an object that can provide a token when the copied token is pasted.

## Responding to search suggestion selections

- **searchTextField(_:didSelect:)**: Tells the delegate when a person selects a search suggestion in the search text field.

## Search field

- **UISearchTextField**: A view for displaying and editing text and search tokens.
- **UISearchToken**: Search criteria in a search text field, represented by text and an optional icon.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- UITextFieldDelegate
